issue.title: arrow java build broken on trusty
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4357](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4357). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://travis-ci.com/dremio/arrow-build/builds/98435917>

 
SLF4J: The requested version 1.5.6 by your slf4j binding is not compatible with [1.6, 1.7]
SLF4J: See http://www.slf4j.org/codes.html#version_mismatch for further details.
